column5: Hello folks, just looking for some information on this lake, I am renting a cottage there in August. Have conflicting reports that there may (or may not) be large mouth in Bob Lake. Any info would be appreciated.......information is power.....PM me if you like.   Thank You Greg
Yes there's large and small mouth and natural lake trout with a slot size in Bob.
Thank you for the info Chris, the MNR website only mentions smallmouth bass, no mention of largies.......
I fished it one a few years ago. We caught so many stunted smallmouth it became annoying. Didn't catch any largemouth but heard that they are in there
Go for the smallies and lakers, largemouths are swamp donkeys anyways, and god made largemouths for people who cant real fish
